DOC.brief_title: Anterior Vaginal Wall Repair With Mesh Combination With TVT-O Reduce Urinary Stress Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: Urinary stress incontinence define leakage urine stress ( cough , lough , sneeze , coitus , heavy lifting , physical activity ) . Urinary stress incontinence health problem social , economic psychological consequence . The appearance Urinary stress incontinence post vaginal wall prolapse repair know phenomenon . Part case relate pre-surgical occult Urinary stress incontinence asymptomatic , part case relate de-novo urinary stress incontinence post surgery . Latest study demonstrate 11-22 % rate post surgical urinary stress incontinence . The CARE study examine efficacy preventive BURCH RETROPUBIC URETHROPEXY among woman underwent abdominal sacrocolpopexy . According study , BURCH procedure reduce rate post surgery urinary stress incontinence . The author recommend offer woman preventive surgery . Those result rely consider vaginal wall repair vaginal approach . The aim study examine efficacy transobturator tension free vaginal tape ( TVT-O ) among woman intend undergo vaginal wall repair vaginal approach .
